title: Mouse support is BROKEN!
body: FIX THIS!  The new command prompt DOES NOT HONOR MOUSE CLICKS.  Run the EDIT program that comes with Windows 10 32 bit and then try to pull the menus down with a mouse.  It doesn't work!!!  There are still apps that run in a Console Mode Window that need mouse support.  This needs to be fixed or I'll be recommending to my 800+ customer base to skip Windows 10!
